attributes.title: App is owned by criminals
attributes.review:
I opened up the app to find it all pro trump which is absolutely DISGUSTING because this man is a racist sexist piece of trash. He is a criminal and does not deserve to make money off of anything. He has so many sexual assault and rape allegations it’s INCREDIBLE. 
The way he speaks about women and POC and immigrants is an ABOMINATION. Vote this man out for the sake of all of our lives and futures.

attributes.title: THE MOST DISGUSTINGLY HORRIFIC APP!!!!!
attributes.review: I was eating cereal this morning when all of a sudden I got a text from a random number. They told me to get the newspaper from outside.after I did that I typed the number on the newspaper onto my phone when I excited the app and went on my home screen I saw a sandpaper down orange Cheeto looking man on my home screen NAKED. I was so scared I ran with my eyes closed the the laundry room and put bleach in my eyes after that I COULD STILL SEE THE CURSED CREATOR so I took bleach pills and was finally able to get the curse out of my eyes, but now on every Wednesday I see the naked creator on my home screen AND THIS IS ALL BECAUSE OF THIS APP it has ruined my life and turned it upside down I never want to see it again

attributes.title: poopy pants✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: This app made my microwave explode.🤯then my fridge made it worse.😤 then my cat became really fat. 🤭🐱then it threw up mac and cheese.🙈 then this app made my blanket disappear. 🤨WHAT HAPPENED TO MY BLANKET!😡 My phone has started farting sense this app has started.💨 how dare this app.✨ then my painting has pooped it’s pants. 🧚‍♀️this app just needs to get off the app store😡✨🧚‍♀️ then my cat walked its self to burger king 👑 to get themselves a chicken 🐓 nugget. my chair has disappeared 👻. my painting 🖼 said it very disappointed ☹️ in me 😩 my hamster 🐹 said it pooped💩 it’s pants 👖 i hope you have fun eating 🍽 poop💩🥳🤩 lets go to a poop party 🎉 bye🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: Chreesmuss
attributes.userName: O L I V E S

attributes.title: MY DINOSAUR RAN AWAY!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review:
Don’t download this app!!! When I opened it it asked for my social security number so, obviously I gave it to them. As well as my credit card number, phone number, and address. The next thing I know a man busts into my house! He was OBVIOUSLY wearing foundation😌✨ but I mean  i was also wearing foundation (but mine matched my natural skin tone) no judgement🥰 BUT I noticed something weird about him. His foundation was a combination of 
•cheeto dust
•orange peels
•nacho cheese doritos
•orange crayons 
•carrot skins
andddd to top it all off whatever foundation sebastian bails uses. Now, no hate or anything but I also happened to notice his hair. His hair looked like a banana peel was payed on his head or something. But ANYWAYSSSS, he stomped into my house asked if I knew the muffin man to which I responded: of course I know the muffin man I felt like he insulted me because it’s a well known fact that everyone knows the muffin man! Then he yelled at my hamster and told it to make its bed, BUTTTT I DONT EVEN OWN A HAMSTER! After that he sold my Elkay LZS8WSSP Enhanced EZH2O Bottle Filling Cooler, Filtered, 8 GPH, Light Grey wall mountable drinking fountain that was amazons choice for drinking fountains (it was $1,037.27 and had 4.5/5 stars😡😡😡) so he sold it to the Russian government.😡 THEN HE HAD THE AUDACITY TO STEAL MY 20ft tall purple dinosaur land ate all my dino nuggets! Like what the heck cheeto man you didn’t have to go that far. But then I asked if he put the muffins in the freezer and HE SAID HE DID! I solved it ladies and gentlemen 😌 you’re welcome. Anyways he stole my social security number and sold it on the dark web but that’s nbd. Oh and you can tell that this was made by our loving president because it has more bugs than our country has covid cases😌
 -the girl in a deep depression because her dino nuggets are gone😔

attributes.title: This app is butt
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and before I could even put my mobile number in I was informed that the app had installed a virus and that my phone would self destruct in a matter of seconds. Obviously I was caught off guard and couldn’t get away in time. In conclusion, this app is the reason my eyebrows are gone and my house burned down. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!

attributes.title: Horrible app!!!!
attributes.review: This app is The most non-useful app I have ever seen in my life glitches every time end it lies to me and my pet donkey went to McDonald’s and they asked him if he had the app and he said yes and then they gave him a free burger that said trump 2020 on it and we do not support rapist racist people and oranges I don’t even know why I thought of getting this app if there is any app you will get it better be Tik tok The next time me and my pet donkey you think about getting this app we are going to look at the reviews first because my pet donkey did not like anything it had to bring I hope you have a terrible day enjoy my review it worse than the poop under my toilet seat🤡🤡!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is poop smells like poop looks like poop and makes no sense as soon as I downloaded this app I had the worst of luck and a huge dinosaur came in and robbed me out of all my cake! This is not a good app!!! Everyone give this a one star review so we can delete it!!!
